title: guild/:id does not match its example

comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body: Some fields are only returned when you request the guild endpoint with an api key of the guild leader, otherwise you will only get public data.

comments.author: Tshakaar.6429
comments.body: API is down for the moment (Lawton disabeld it until tomorrow evening), so i can’t check. But i can tell you that: wiki is maintained by players, like you and me, and if this endpoint changed and nobody reports the changes on the wiki…

comments.author: pruocco.5368
comments.body:
https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/API:2/guild/:id

The example at the bottom does not match what the API actual provides you. Is this a mistake, or a preview of whats to come? I am looking to retrieve the level, motd, influence, favor, aetherium, and resonance in particular.

Thanks
